hooks.command: if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.js || "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.ts || "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.jsx || "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.tsx ]]; then npx eslint "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" --fix 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.py ]]; then pylint "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.rb ]]; then rubocop "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" --auto-correct 2>/dev/null || true; fi
